engineeringPrompts.title: Code Review Best Practices
engineeringPrompts.content: As a software engineer, provide a step-by-step guide for conducting an effective code review. Include best practices for giving constructive feedback, what to look for in the code, and how to ensure the review process is efficient and beneficial for the team.

engineeringPrompts.title: Debugging Strategy
engineeringPrompts.content: Outline a systematic approach to debugging complex software issues. Include steps for reproducing the problem, isolating the cause, and implementing a solution. Provide examples of common debugging tools and techniques.

engineeringPrompts.title: Software Architecture Design
engineeringPrompts.content: Explain the process of designing a scalable and maintainable software architecture. Cover topics such as choosing appropriate design patterns, considering performance and security, and documenting the architecture effectively.

productManagementPrompts.title: Product Roadmap Creation
productManagementPrompts.content: As a product manager, outline the key steps and considerations for creating a comprehensive product roadmap. Include how to prioritize features, align with business goals, and communicate the roadmap effectively to stakeholders.

productManagementPrompts.title: Conducting User Research
productManagementPrompts.content: Provide a guide on conducting effective user research for product development. Include methods for gathering user feedback, analyzing user behavior, and translating insights into actionable product improvements.

productManagementPrompts.title: Feature Prioritization Framework
productManagementPrompts.content: Describe a framework for prioritizing product features. Include techniques such as impact vs effort analysis, user story mapping, and how to balance user needs with business objectives.

marketingPrompts.title: Marketing Campaign Strategy
marketingPrompts.content: As a marketing professional, provide a framework for developing a successful marketing campaign strategy. Include steps for identifying target audience, choosing appropriate channels, creating compelling content, and measuring campaign effectiveness.

marketingPrompts.title: Social Media Marketing Plan
marketingPrompts.content: Outline a comprehensive social media marketing plan. Cover topics such as platform selection, content calendar creation, engagement strategies, and performance metrics to track.

marketingPrompts.title: Brand Positioning Strategy
marketingPrompts.content: Explain the process of developing a strong brand positioning strategy. Include steps for identifying unique selling propositions, analyzing competitors, and creating a compelling brand narrative.

customerSupportPrompts.title: Customer Support Scenario Handling
customerSupportPrompts.content: As a customer support representative, describe how to handle the following common scenarios: 1) An angry customer demanding a refund, 2) A customer reporting a technical issue with the product, 3) A customer requesting a feature that doesn't exist. Provide step-by-step guidance for each scenario.

customerSupportPrompts.title: Building Customer Empathy
customerSupportPrompts.content: Provide techniques for developing and demonstrating empathy in customer interactions. Include examples of empathetic language, active listening skills, and how to handle emotionally charged situations.

customerSupportPrompts.title: Improving Support Efficiency
customerSupportPrompts.content: Outline strategies for improving efficiency in customer support operations. Cover topics such as creating and maintaining a knowledge base, using macros for common responses, and effectively escalating complex issues.
